mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SUPPORT (SUPPORT_NUMBER, SUPPORT_SPONSER, SUPPORT_RECEIVER, NOVEL_NUMBER, SUPPORT_COIN) VALUES(SUPPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{supportSponser}, #{supportReceiver}, #{novelNumber}, #{supportCoin})
mapper.select: SELECT SUPPORT_SPONSER, SUM(SUPPORT_COIN) AS SUPPORT_TOTAL FROM TBL_SUPPORT WHERE SUPPORT_SPONSER = #{supportSponser} GROUP BY SUPPORT_SPONSER
